bioconda.name: ra
bioconda.summary: Ra is short for RNA Assembler and it is a C++ implementation of an overlap-layout-consensus transcriptome assembler.

biocontainers.name: ra
biocontainers.summary: Ra is short for rna assembler and it is a c++ implementation of an overlap-layout-consensus transcriptome assembler.

biotools.summary: Assembler for raw de novo genome assembly of long uncorrected reads.

bioschemas.name: Ra
bioschemas.summary: Assembler for raw de novo genome assembly of long uncorrected reads.
